#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <climits>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	vector<pair<int, int> > values;
	int test, maxi = INT_MIN;
	cin>>test;
	if(test == 0){
		return 0;
	}
	for(int tell = 0; tell < test; tell++){
		int x, y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		values.push_back(make_pair(x, y));
		maxi = max(maxi , y);
	}
	vector<bool> res(maxi + 1, true);
	for(int i = 2 ; i < maxi; i++){
		for(int j = 2 * i; j <= maxi ; j += i){
			res[j] = false;
		}
	}
	for(int tell = 0; tell < test; tell++){
		int x = values[tell].first, y = values[tell].second, count = 0;
		for(int i = x; i <= y; i++){
			if(res[i]){
				//cout<<i<<" ";
				count++;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
}
